Articles.Content:
I wanted to try RSS at half scale as base RSS, even with mods like SMURFF, but it was just too much for me. I was barely able to limp to orbit in the early game, and after that, I found myself hamstrung by a lack of funds and science. I still want a challenge, with the need for larger rockets, more fuel, and longer distances, but for it to be less grindy than the base-scale.

I know that Half Size RSS exists, but I was unable to get it to work on an up-to-date current version of KSP. I just wonder if there are up-to-date versions somewhere or if there is any other way to get the same result in a preferred stable state.

i was thinking that Sigma Dimensions might be a good alternative, but not sure how stable it is in long playthroughs.

Edit: I tried Sigma Dimensions, but it didn't work that well. I had problems with atmospheric cloud textures loading while still in orbit, and the scatterer atmospheres were too high. and lots of little issues on top of those.

Edited March 22 by dOnut14
